snippet: The ruling by a federal appeals court came a day after a Supreme Court decision that could pave the way for a nationwide right to same-sex marriage.
abstract: United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit, in San Francisco, strikes down same-sex marriage bans in Idaho and in Nevada, latest in a nearly unbroken string of courtroom victories for gay couples.
lead_paragraph: The ruling by a federal appeals court came a day after a Supreme Court decision that could pave the way for a nationwide right to same-sex marriage.

headline.main: Gay Marriage Is Upheld in Nevada and Idaho
headline.print_headline: Gay Marriage Is Upheld in Nevada and Idaho

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
